name: Compendium (konstantin.fedorov)
description:
Explore the procedurally generated world, draw images of found structures, talk with mysterious creatures, find an ability to fly and complete a compendium!

Controls: 

[E] - interaction, [Space] - open/fold the wings, [M] - map, [C] - compensation, [Esc] - menu, [Up]/[Down] - scale, [H] - help. When walking [WASD] - movement, when fly [A]/[D] - turn counterclockwise/clockwise. When drawing [A]/[D] - turning the pen counterclockwise/clockwise.

Languages: English, Russian

Game idea, graphics, code: KonstantinF (konstantin.fedorov)
Special thanks for music to alkakrab
